title: Beginner Track
description: Perfect for those new to open source. Learn the fundamentals and make your first contribution.

modules.title: Git & GitHub Fundamentals
modules.description: Learn the basics of version control and GitHub workflow

lessons.title: What is Git?
lessons.content: Understanding version control and why it's essential for open source

lessons.title: Git Basics
lessons.content: Learn essential Git commands: clone, add, commit, push

lessons.title: GitHub Workflow
lessons.content: Understanding repositories, branches, and pull requests

challenges.title: Create Your First Repository
challenges.description: Set up a GitHub account and create your first repository

modules.title: Understanding Open Source
modules.description: Learn what open source is and how to contribute effectively

lessons.title: What is Open Source?
lessons.content: Understanding the philosophy and benefits of open source

lessons.title: Types of Contributions
lessons.content: Code, documentation, design, and community contributions

lessons.title: Finding Projects to Contribute
lessons.content: How to discover projects that match your interests and skills

challenges.title: Explore 5 Open Source Projects
challenges.description: Find and bookmark 5 projects you'd like to contribute to

modules.title: Your First Contribution
modules.description: Make your first meaningful contribution to an open source project

lessons.title: Finding Good First Issues
lessons.content: How to identify beginner-friendly issues and understand project requirements

lessons.title: Fork and Clone
lessons.content: Learn to fork repositories and set up your development environment

lessons.title: Creating Pull Requests
lessons.content: The complete process from issue to merged pull request

challenges.title: Make Your First Pull Request
challenges.description: Contribute to a real open source project

modules.title: Community Engagement
modules.description: Learn how to engage with open source communities effectively

lessons.title: Effective Communication
lessons.content: How to communicate professionally in open source communities

lessons.title: Code Review Process
lessons.content: Understanding and participating in code review processes

lessons.title: Community Guidelines
lessons.content: Understanding codes of conduct and community standards

title: Intermediate Track
description: For those with basic open source experience. Deepen your skills and start mentoring others.

modules.title: Advanced Git Workflows
modules.description: Master complex Git operations and collaborative workflows

lessons.title: Branching Strategies
lessons.content: GitFlow, GitHub Flow, and other branching models

lessons.title: Resolving Merge Conflicts
lessons.content: How to handle and resolve merge conflicts effectively

lessons.title: Git Hooks and Automation
lessons.content: Automating workflows with Git hooks

challenges.title: Resolve a Complex Merge
challenges.description: Successfully resolve a merge conflict in a real project

modules.title: Code Review & Collaboration
modules.description: Learn to review code effectively and collaborate with teams

lessons.title: Code Review Process
lessons.content: Understanding the code review workflow and best practices

lessons.title: Giving Constructive Feedback
lessons.content: How to provide helpful and constructive code reviews

lessons.title: Receiving and Acting on Feedback
lessons.content: How to respond to code review feedback professionally

challenges.title: Review 10 Pull Requests
challenges.description: Provide meaningful reviews for 10 different pull requests

modules.title: Project Architecture
modules.description: Understand how large open source projects are structured

lessons.title: Understanding Project Structure
lessons.content: How large projects organize code and documentation

lessons.title: Testing Strategies
lessons.content: Unit tests, integration tests, and CI/CD pipelines

lessons.title: Technical Documentation
lessons.content: Writing clear and comprehensive technical documentation

challenges.title: Improve Project Documentation
challenges.description: Contribute meaningful improvements to project documentation

modules.title: Mentoring Others
modules.description: Learn to guide and support other contributors

lessons.title: Mentorship Skills
lessons.content: How to be an effective mentor in open source

lessons.title: Identifying Potential Mentees
lessons.content: How to find and connect with people who need guidance

lessons.title: Mentorship Tools and Techniques
lessons.content: Tools and techniques for effective mentorship

challenges.title: Mentor a Beginner
challenges.description: Successfully guide someone through their first contribution

title: Advanced Track
description: For experienced contributors ready to lead projects and build communities.

modules.title: Project Leadership
modules.description: Learn to lead and manage open source projects

lessons.title: Open Source Leadership
lessons.content: Principles of effective open source project leadership

lessons.title: Project Management
lessons.content: Managing issues, milestones, and project roadmaps

lessons.title: Community Decision Making
lessons.content: How to make decisions in consensus-driven communities

challenges.title: Lead a Small Project
challenges.description: Take leadership role in a project or feature

modules.title: Community Building
modules.description: Learn to build and nurture open source communities

lessons.title: Community Strategy
lessons.content: Developing strategies for community growth and engagement

lessons.title: Event Planning and Management
lessons.content: Organizing meetups, conferences, and online events

lessons.title: Diversity and Inclusion
lessons.content: Creating inclusive and welcoming communities

challenges.title: Organize a Community Event
challenges.description: Plan and execute a community event or workshop

modules.title: Technical Writing
modules.description: Master the art of technical communication and documentation

lessons.title: Technical Writing Skills
lessons.content: Principles of clear and effective technical writing

lessons.title: Documentation Systems
lessons.content: Setting up and maintaining documentation systems

lessons.title: API Documentation
lessons.content: Writing comprehensive API documentation

challenges.title: Write a Comprehensive Guide
challenges.description: Create a detailed guide for a complex topic

modules.title: Open Source Strategy
modules.description: Understand the business and strategic aspects of open source

lessons.title: Open Source Business Models
lessons.content: How companies build sustainable open source businesses

lessons.title: Licensing and Legal
lessons.content: Understanding open source licenses and legal considerations

lessons.title: Funding and Sustainability
lessons.content: Strategies for funding and sustaining open source projects

challenges.title: Develop a Project Strategy
challenges.description: Create a strategic plan for an open source project
